isis.stitle: DT/DTI-466 A and B Series DT/DTI/DTA-466 C Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1993) - ENGINE DIAGNOSTIC TEST PROCEDURES - DT/DTI/DTA - 466 C SERIES DIESEL ENGINES - SHUTOFF CABLE/ELECTRIC SHUTOFF DT/DTI/DTA-466 C Engines (With Robert Bosch "MW" or "A" Fuel Injection Pump) - I. SHUTOFF CABLE (MANUAL SHUTOFF)

svcsubproc.title: Visual Check
svcsubproc.para:
With the shutoff cable pulled out to stop the engine, the shutoff lever must contact the shutoff screw, as shown in Figures 6.19 and 6.20
.

figure.caption: Figure 6.19 Shutoff Test (466 w/Robert Bosch "MW" Pump)

svcsubproc.title: Adjustment
svcsubproc.para: To ensure that the control rack is not restricted by the shutoff lever during engine operation, adjust the shutoff cable so it can be attached to the shutoff lever when the cable knob is fully seated against the instrument panel and the shutoff lever is turned fully counterclockwise (Full Run - Fuel On Position).

figure.caption: Figure 6.20 Shutoff Test (466 w/Robert Bosch "A" Pump)
